s_synopsis: In the days when we could still travel between the human world and the world of magic, there lived Tonma, an apprentice to the wizerd Merlin. One day when meditating, Tonma heard the voice of a princess crying out for help. He asked Merlin what this might mean and Merlin told him: "Tonma. You were born a Royal prince in another country, and the princess is destined to be your bride." Tonma resolved to rescue the princess, and set off on a journey to the world of magic....
